original_title: Berryz工房コンサートツアー2006春〜にょきにょきチャンピオン！〜
overview: Berryz Kobo was a Japanese idol girl group part of Hello! Project, produced by Tsunku. "Nyoki Nyoki Champion!" features their May 3 concert at Nanako Sunplaza, filmed during their 2006 spring tour.
title: Berryz Kobo Concert Tour 2006 Haru: Nyoki Nyoki Champion!
